page.title: 05Transport In 1985
page.content: In the twentieth century there are lots of different kinds of transport The earliest kind of transport is the canal.Canals are man-made and are straight and direct.However they are slow because you have to pass through a lock to go up hills. A more efficient means of transport is the train.The train was powered by steam.Today it is either diesel or electric.There are three railway stations in our area,Waltham Cross ,Cheshunt and Theobalds Grove.This is because a lot of people commute to work in London each day. The most popular form of transport today is road transport.People can travel by bus,bicycle or car.Most people travel by car.This can cause such problems as pollution,noise and accidents.The two main roads in this area are the A10 and the A1010.
